name: telegram-channel-teneo
description: A Teneo bot connector for Telegram.

WEBHOOK_FOR_TELEGRAM.description: Webhook for Telegram i.e. the server it will send messages to i.e. external address for server this application runs on. https://[yourappname].herokuapp.com

PORT.description: Port this runs on.  Defaults to 8443

TENEO_ENGINE_URL.description: Please input your Teneo Engine URL. https://some.engine/instance/

TELEGRAM_TOKEN.description: Enter the token you recieved when creating your bot in the app using the Botfather.
